title: The Death of Ahab
summary: Ahab joins King Jehoshaphat of Judah to fight Syria. Despite warnings from the prophet Micaiah, Ahab proceeds and disguises himself. A random arrow fatally wounds him. The book ends with a summary of Jehoshaphat’s and Ahaziah’s reigns.

faq.question: What did the prophet Micaiah warn?
faq.answer: That Israel would be scattered and Ahab would die in battle.

faq.question: How did Ahab die?
faq.answer: A random arrow struck him, fulfilling the prophecy of his death.
